About Me

Hi I am Twisha Sahay ,
A Machine Learning enthusiast with experience in two internships and self-projects. Deep Learning has interested me so I have invested my time in building my concepts from neural networks to how to execute and understand Deep Learning Architectures in both CNN and NLP. I plan to pursue a masters in Computer Science to gain knowledge and skill sets to attain jobs in this field.
